page.title: 10LOCAL POLITICS
page.content: POLITICAL FEELINGS IN AND AROUND SHELDON IT SEEMS ARE MAINLY CONSERVATIVE.THESE FEELINGS HAVE BEEN THE SAME FOR SOME YEARS,MAYBE THE NEXT FEW YEARS WILL SEE A CHANGE IN VIEW. THE COUNTY COUNCILLOR (BAKEWELL AREA) REPRESENTATIVE IS Mr.N.WILSON OF YOULGREAVE.HIS JOB IS TO ADVISE AND CARRY OUT GOVERMENT RULINGS IN THE AREA. ON A SMALLER SCALE BUT MORE PERSONAL WE HAVE A PARISH COUNCIL WHICH LOOKS AFTER AND CONTROLS OUR IMMEDIATE AFFAIRS.Mr.A.SLACK IS OUR PARISH COUNCILLOR.HIS POLITICAL BELIEFS DON'T MATTER AS LONG AS HIS GENUINE CONCERN IS FOR THE STANDARD AND UPKEEP OF THE VILLAGE. AT LOCAL AND NATIONAL ELECTIONS LOCAL ELECTORS VOTE AT OUR VILLAGE HALL.
